com.paymill.services

Class OfferService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paymill.services.OfferService

  • public class OfferService
extends Object
    The OfferService is used to list, create, edit, delete and update PAYMILL Offers.
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Vassil Nikolov

    • Method Detail

      • list

        public PaymillList<Offer> list()
        This function returns a List of PAYMILL Offer objects.
        Returns:
        PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Offers and their total count.

      • list

        public PaymillList<Offer> list(Integer count,
                      Integer offset)
        This function returns a List of PAYMILL Offer objects, overriding the default count and offset.
        Parameters:
        count - Max Integer of returned objects in the PaymillList
        offset - Integer to start from.
        Returns:
        PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Offers and their total count.

      • list

        public PaymillList<Offer> list(Offer.Filter filter,
                      Offer.Order order)
        This function returns a List of PAYMILL Offer objects. In which order this list is returned depends on the optional parameters. If null is given, no filter or order will be applied.
        Parameters:
        filter - Offer.Filter or null
        order - Offer.Order or null
        Returns:
        PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Offers and their total count.

      • list

        public PaymillList<Offer> list(Offer.Filter filter,
                      Offer.Order order,
                      Integer count,
                      Integer offset)
        This function returns a List of PAYMILL Offer objects. In which order this list is returned depends on the optional parameters. If null is given, no filter or order will be applied, overriding the default count and offset.
        Parameters:
        filter - Offer.Filter or null
        order - Offer.Order or null
        count - Max Integer of returned objects in the PaymillList
        offset - Integer to start from.
        Returns:
        PaymillList which contains a List of PAYMILL Offers and their total count.

      • get

        public Offer get(Offer offer)
        Get and refresh the details of an existing PAYMILL Offer.
        Parameters:
        offer - A Offer with Id.
        Returns:
        Refreshed instance of the given Offer.

      • get

        public Offer get(String offerId)
        Get and refresh the details of an existing PAYMILL Offer.
        Parameters:
        offerId - Id of the Offer
        Returns:
        Refreshed instance of the given Offer.

      • create

        public Offer create(Integer amount,
           String currency,
           Interval.Period interval,
           String name)
        Creates an offer via the API.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount in cents > 0.
        currency - ISO 4217 formatted currency code.
        interval - Defining how often the Client should be charged. Format: number DAY | WEEK | MONTH | YEAR
        name - Your name for this offer
        Returns:
        Offer object with id, which represents a PAYMILL offer.

      • create

        public Offer create(Integer amount,
           String currency,
           Interval.Period interval,
           String name,
           Integer trialPeriodDays)
        Creates an offer via the API.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount in cents > 0.
        currency - ISO 4217 formatted currency code.
        interval - Defining how often the Client should be charged.
        name - Your name for this offer
        trialPeriodDays - Give it a try or charge directly. Can be null.
        Returns:
        Offer object with id, which represents a PAYMILL offer.

      • create

        public Offer create(Integer amount,
           String currency,
           String interval,
           String name)
        Creates an offer via the API.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount in cents > 0.
        currency - ISO 4217 formatted currency code.
        interval - Defining how often the Client should be charged. Format: number DAY | WEEK | MONTH | YEAR
        name - Your name for this offer
        Returns:
        Offer object with id, which represents a PAYMILL offer.

      • create

        public Offer create(Integer amount,
           String currency,
           String interval,
           String name,
           Integer trialPeriodDays)
        Creates an offer via the API.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount in cents > 0.
        currency - ISO 4217 formatted currency code.
        interval - Defining how often the Client should be charged.
        name - Your name for this offer
        trialPeriodDays - Give it a try or charge directly. Can be null.
        Returns:
        Offer object with id, which represents a PAYMILL offer.

      • update

        public Offer update(Offer offer,
           boolean updateSubscriptions)
        Updates an offer. Following properties will be updated:

        • name
        • amount
        • interval
        • currency

        Parameters:
        offer - Offer with Id.
        updateSubscriptions - when set to true, all associated subscriptions will be updated (except trial_period_days). When set to false, no subscriptions will be updated.
        Returns:
        the updated offer.

      • delete

        public void delete(Offer offer,
          boolean removeWithSubscriptions)
        Remove an offer.
        Parameters:
        offer - the Offer.
        removeWithSubscriptions - if true, the plan and all subscriptions associated with it will be deleted. If false, only the plan will be deleted.

      • delete

        public void delete(String offerId,
          boolean removeWithSubscriptions)
        Remove an offer.
        Parameters:
        offerId - Id of the Offer
        removeWithSubscriptions - if true, the plan and all subscriptions associated with it will be deleted. If false, only the plan will be deleted.
